appDesc.message: Enjoy Chinese-English web translation with one click by Lingocloud.

clickToStartTrans.message: Click 'Play' to enjoy bilingual subtitles of videos produced by LingoCloud AI

requestingAudioMsg.message: Trying to record the audio of the video by the mircrophone ...

openRecorder.message: Recognizing the audio of video, trying to create the WebSocket ...

openRecorderError.message: Failed to recognize the audio of video ...

videoTransDes1.message: Please choose the translation direction of video, or click 'Play directly'

videoTransDes2.message:
If you choose the translation direction, LingoCloud will close other tabs' LingoCloud subtitle,
and focus on this tab to provide you the best translation

minimizeTransTip.message: Double click the LingoCloud subtitle to minimize it

maximizeTransTip.message: Double click the LingoCloud subtitle to maximize it

wsIsConnecting.message: The WebSocket is trying to connect the LingoCloud service ...

wsIsNotOpened.message: Error happened with creating WebSocket, please check your internet connection or contact us

wsError.message: Error happened with connecting to the LingoCloud service, please check your internet connection or contact us

VideoTransReqLogin.message: We recommend to log in LingoCloud and enjoy bilingual subtitles of videos produced by AI! If you just logged in, please reload the website and click the extension

searchingVideo.message: LingoCloud is searching for the video of this page ...

videoNotFound.message: Woops! LingoCloud can not find any translatable video, but it still tries to provide you subtitle.

videoAlertMuted.message: In order to recognize audio, please unmute the video

RequireAllowAccessFile.message: Please click 'Allow access to file URLs' of LingoCloud Interpreter at chrome://extensions, then LingoCloud can provide you translation for local video files

getCookieFailed.message: Failed to get cookie, please click the extension again and authorize LingoCloud to get the data
